generalizability_force_field_results.DESCRIPTION: Energy, force, and virial prediction accuracy of the LAM on the test sets across multiple domains. Given that energy labels calculated via DFT can vary by an arbitrary constant due to variations in pseudopotential selection and software implementations, LAMs are consistently used to predict the energy difference between the label and a dummy LAM that estimates potential energy solely based on the chemical formula. In contrast, force and virial predictions are directly obtained from the models.

AQM.DESCRIPTION: An extensive dataset that contains low-and high-energy conformers of 1,653 molecules with a total number of atoms ranging from 2 to 92, and containing up to 54 non-hydrogen atoms. The dataset was deduplicated against OMol25 to prevent data leakage. [https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-024-03521-8]. We provide two sets of labels for this dataset: PBE/6-31G(d) with Gaussian (better aligned with OMat24) and ωB97M-V/def2-TZVPD with ORCA (compatible with OMol25).

energy_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the energy prediction.

energy_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the energy prediction.

energy_rmse_natoms.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the energy prediction per atom.

energy_mae_natoms.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the energy prediction per atom.

force_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the force prediction.

force_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the force prediction.

virial_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the virial prediction.

virial_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the virial prediction.

virial_rmse_natoms.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the virial prediction per atom.

virial_mae_natoms.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the virial prediction per atom.

H_nature_2022.DESCRIPTION: A downsampled dataset containing AIMD conformations of 19 reaction channels for hydrogen combustion. [https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-022-01330-5]. We provide two sets of labels for this dataset: PBE/6-31G(d) with Gaussian (better aligned with OMat24) and ωB97M-V/def2-TZVPD with ORCA (compatible with OMol25).

AIMD_Chig.DESCRIPTION: A downsampled dataset containing MD conformations of 166-atom protein Chignolin. The original Ab initio simulations were driven by M062X/6-31G* with a Berendsen thermostat at 340 K. [https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-023-02465-9]. The dataset was relabeled using Gaussian with PBE/6-31G(d).

HEA25_S.DESCRIPTION: A dataset of high entropy alloy surfaces, focusing on 25 d-block transition metals, excluding Tc, Cd, Re, Os and Hg. The original dataset were calculated using VASP with PBEsol/PAW, 550 eV cutoff, and Γ-centered k-points. [https://arxiv.org/abs/2212.13254]. The dataset was relabeled with VASP at the PBE level.

NequIP_NC_2022.DESCRIPTION: A downsampled dataset with ~7500 frames. The original dataset contains approximately 57,000 configurations from the evaluation datasets for NequIP graph neural network model for interatomic potentials. Trajectories have been taken from Li-P-S, Li-P-O glass melt-quench simulation. Calculations were performed using VASP with PBE/PAW and an energy cutoff of 400 eV. [https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-022-29939-5]

generalizability_domain_specific_results.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation metrics for domain specific property calculation tasks when utilizing the LAM as the force field.

phonon_mdr.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation metrics based on phonon calculations.

mae_entropy.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error in calculated entropy.

mae_free_energy.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error in calculated free energy.

mae_heat_capacity.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error in calculated heat capacity.

mae_max_freq.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error in the maximum phonon frequency, in K. (Conversion factor from THz to K is 47.9924)

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The success rate of phonon calculations.

torsionnet.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation of torsional barrier related metrics on the TorsionNet-500 dataset at the CCSD(T)/CBS level.

MAE.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the energy prediction across all configurations.

RMSE.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the energy prediction across all configurations.

MAEB.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the torsional barrier height.

NABH_h.DESCRIPTION: The number of molecules (total = 500) for which the model prediction of potential barrier height has an error of more than 1 kcal/mol.

neb.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation of energy barrier related metrics on the OC20NEB-OOD dataset. The dataset contains 460 NEB trajectories over 3 types of reactions: desorption, dissociation, and transfer. For details, please refer to https://arxiv.org/abs/2405.02078. The energy barrier height is calculated with single point energy prediction on DFT relaxed structures using the LAM model without performing NEB optimization.

MAE_Ea.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the energy barrier prediction across all OOD trajectories.

MAE_dE.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the reaction energy prediction across all OOD trajectories.

ø_Desorption.DESCRIPTION: The percentage of desorption reactions (total = 127) for which the model prediction of potential barrier height has an error of more than 0.1 eV.

ø_Dissociation.DESCRIPTION: The percentage of dissociation reactions (total = 158) for which the model prediction of potential barrier height has an error of more than 0.1 eV.

ø_Transfer.DESCRIPTION: The percentage of transfer reactions (total = 175) for which the model prediction of potential barrier height has an error of more than 0.1 eV.

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The success rate of NEB calculations.

wiggle150.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation of the wiggle150 dataset. This dataset contains geometries and DLPNO−CCSD(T)/CBS energies for three different molecules with 50 strained conformations each.

MAE.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the energy prediction across all configurations relative to the minimized ground-state conformer.

RMSE.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the energy prediction across all configurations relative to the minimized ground-state conformer.

elastic.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation of the elastic constants over 1181 structures from the MP database proposed in `Sci Data 2, 150009 (2015). https://doi.org/10.1038/sdata.2015.9.`

MAE_G_VRH.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the shear modulus across all configurations.

MAE_K_VRH.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the bulk modulus across all configurations.

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The success rate of elastic property calculations.

vacancy.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation of the oxygen vacancy formation energy over 1813 structures. Structures are obtained from `Chem. Mater. 2023, 35, 24, 10619–10634. https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/acs.chemmater.3c02251.`

MAE.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the oxygen vacancy formation energy across all configurations.

RMSE.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the oxygen vacancy formation energy across all configurations.

binding_energy.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation of the protein-ligand binding energy using the PLF547 dataset proposed in `J. Chem. Inf. Model. 2020, 60, 3, 1453–1460. https://pubs.acs.org/doi/10.1021/acs.jcim.9b01171.`

MAE.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the protein-ligand binding energy across all configurations.

RMSE.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the protein-ligand binding energy across all configurations.

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The success rate of protein-ligand binding energy calculations.

rxn_barrier.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation of the reaction barrier using the BH876 dataset provided in `https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.13468.`

MAE.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the reaction barrier across all configurations.

RMSE.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the reaction barrier across all configurations.

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The success rate of reaction barrier calculations.

pressure.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation of the volume over 45 structures at elevated pressure from 25 GPa to 150 GPa. Structures are obtained from `Antoine Loew et al 2026 J. Phys. Mater. 9 015010. https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/2515-7639/ae2ba8.`

MAE.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the volume per atom across all configurations and all pressures.

RMSE.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the volume per atom across all configurations and all pressures.

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The success rate of volume calculations at elevated pressures.

stacking_fault.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation of the stacking fault energy over 46 structures. For each structure, 10 frames were taken from each sliding trajectory, and are labeled with VASP PBE-PAW. During metrics calculation, a shape-preserving PCHIP interpolation is applied to the energy profile along the sliding path, and all datapoints from the interpolated energy profile are used to compute the metrics.

MAE_E.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the stacking fault energy.

MAE_dE.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the normalized change in stacking fault energy per unit displacement along the sliding path (derivative divided by the maximum stacking fault energy).

adaptability_results.DESCRIPTION: Accuracy of the property finetuning task. Note: The test results does not represent the converged accuracy due to limited fine-tuning steps.

Matbench_mp_e_form.DESCRIPTION: Formation energy of materials, in meV/atom. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of formation energy of materials

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of formation energy of materials

Matbench_mp_gap.DESCRIPTION: Band gap of materials, in eV. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of band gap of materials

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of band gap of materials

Matbench_jdft2d.DESCRIPTION: 2D exfoliation energy from JARVIS-DFT dataset, in meV/atom. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of 2D exfoliation energy

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of 2D exfoliation energy

Matbench_phonons.DESCRIPTION: Frequency of the highest frequency optical phonon mode peak, in units of 1/cm. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the highest frequency optical phonon mode peak

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the highest frequency optical phonon mode peak

Matbench_dielectric.DESCRIPTION: Refractive index of materials, unitless. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the refractive index

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the refractive index

Matbench_log_kvrh.DESCRIPTION: Logarithm of the DFT Voigt-Reuss-Hill average bulk moduli in GPa. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the logarithm of the bulk modulus

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the logarithm of the bulk modulus

Matbench_log_gvrh.DESCRIPTION: Logarithm of the DFT Voigt-Reuss-Hill average shear moduli in GPa. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the logarithm of the shear modulus

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the logarithm of the shear modulus

Matbench_perovskites.DESCRIPTION: Formation energy of perovskites, in meV/unit cell. 5-fold average.

property_rmse.DESCRIPTION: The root mean squared error of the formation energy of perovskites

property_mae.DESCRIPTION: The mean absolute error of the formation energy of perovskites

nve_md.DESCRIPTION: A standard NVE MD simulation over 9 different atomic systems, sampled from multiple domains.

slope.DESCRIPTION: The slope of the energy drift during NVE-MD.

simulation_time.DESCRIPTION: The time taken to simulate 10 ps, in seconds.

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The success rate of the simulation over 9 test cases.

inference_efficiency.DESCRIPTION: Evaluation metrics for the computational efficiency of inference tasks. For each LAM, the maximum number of atoms that can be handled by the GPU device is dynamically determined by a binary search algorithm to ensure the measured efficiency is within or close to the convergence regime.

average_time.DESCRIPTION: The average inference time per atom of e/f/v inference on 1000 different structures (first 20% excluded as warm-up), in microsecond per atom.

standard_deviation.DESCRIPTION: The standard deviation of inference time.

success_rate.DESCRIPTION: The ratio of the structures inferred without error.
